description: An insulated, heavyweight 100% organic cotton flannel jacket that makes a great overshirt when temperatures drop. Fair Trade Certified™ sewn.
name: Patagonia Insulated Organic Cotton Midweight Fjord Flannel Shirt - Mens

specs.value: 2.4-oz 100% recycled polyester twill with a PFC-free DWR finish (durable water repellent coating that does not contain perfluorinated chemicals)
